item.title: SoundWalk 2011 is coming
item.description: Just in case you missed it, SoundWalk Long Beach 2011 is just around the corner! Check out the newly posted set of mp3’s from last year’s event at craque.net (or download a zip file of flac files directly). Here’s a couple of pix from last year’s event… [][2]Craque performing at SoundWalk 2010 in Long Beach, CA [][3]Dave doubles as stagehand and soundmaker improvisor [][4]Later in the evening, up close with participants
